product_name: Sawyer Inline Adapter Water Filter Connections
long_description: The Sawyer Inline Adapter Water Filter connections allow you to create an inline hydration pack filtration system with the 0.1 micron Sawyer Squeeze water filter (sold separately). Simply screw the connections onto the Squeeze filter and insert the filter inline into your hydration pack drink tube (sold separately). With the filter installed in your drink tube you can fill your reservoir with dirty water and drink away. For times when you don't need to filter water, unscrew the connections from the filter then screw them together to reconnect the tube. Also works with the Sawyer All-In-One water filter (sold separately). Sawyer Inline Adapter Water Filter connections weigh 1 oz.
short_description: The Sawyer Inline Adapter Water Filter connections allow you to create an inline hydration pack filtration system with the 0.1 micron Sawyer Squeeze water filter (sold separately).
